title: dogonswapofficial
author: dogonswapofficial
created_time: May 22, 2023, 02:04:31 PMLast edit: May 22, 2023, 02:20:47 PM by dogonswapofficial

comments.author: terciduk123
comments.body: What about your platform's security? Is it truly secure, and has it been audited? I saw that some views appeared to be concealed, which discouraged me from connecting my wallet to your site.

comments.author: TimeTeller
comments.body: Quote from: terciduk123 on May 23, 2023, 07:19:37 PMWhat about your platform's security? Is it truly secure, and has it been audited? I saw that some views appeared to be concealed, which discouraged me from connecting my wallet to your site.If you want to connect your wallet to their site, better use a new wallet and just transfer the token that you want to trade with.Their attraction to their customers is trade anything, so don't know how diverse they are when it comes to BSC tokens?We can't assure that they have very good security. If you don't want to worry about such flaws, go to known reputable sites.As a new player on this market, they want to attract as many customers as they want. Hence, the marketing of trade anything.

comments.author: terciduk123
comments.body: Quote from: TimeTeller on May 23, 2023, 09:17:00 PMQuote from: terciduk123 on May 23, 2023, 07:19:37 PMWhat about your platform's security? Is it truly secure, and has it been audited? I saw that some views appeared to be concealed, which discouraged me from connecting my wallet to your site.If you want to connect your wallet to their site, better use a new wallet and just transfer the token that you want to trade with.Their attraction to their customers is trade anything, so don't know how diverse they are when it comes to BSC tokens?We can't assure that they have very good security. If you don't want to worry about such flaws, go to known reputable sites.As a new player on this market, they want to attract as many customers as they want. Hence, the marketing of trade anything.True, but so far I have no good reason to connect my wallet with their site. Liquidity on their platform is also unknown. It's better to use a trusted platform.Only use a new platform when there is a good reason such as hoping to get an Airdrop.

comments.author: Angry_Kitty
comments.body: Quote from: terciduk123 on May 24, 2023, 03:29:18 PMQuote from: TimeTeller on May 23, 2023, 09:17:00 PMQuote from: terciduk123 on May 23, 2023, 07:19:37 PMWhat about your platform's security? Is it truly secure, and has it been audited? I saw that some views appeared to be concealed, which discouraged me from connecting my wallet to your site.If you want to connect your wallet to their site, better use a new wallet and just transfer the token that you want to trade with.Their attraction to their customers is trade anything, so don't know how diverse they are when it comes to BSC tokens?We can't assure that they have very good security. If you don't want to worry about such flaws, go to known reputable sites.As a new player on this market, they want to attract as many customers as they want. Hence, the marketing of trade anything.True, but so far I have no good reason to connect my wallet with their site. Liquidity on their platform is also unknown. It's better to use a trusted platform.Only use a new platform when there is a good reason such as hoping to get an Airdrop.If everybody will use only the trusted platforms it will be impossible for new platforms to develop because nobody will use them.

comments.author: terciduk123
comments.body: Quote from: Angry_Kitty on May 26, 2023, 11:54:41 AMIf everybody will use only the trusted platforms it will be impossible for new platforms to develop because nobody will use them.Are you willing to entrust your money to individuals you do not know? or trade in an untrustworthy location?Traders require assurance of trade security at your platform. How can we trust you if you don't ensure trade security at your platform?

comments.author: Defi_space
comments.body: Quote from: terciduk123 on May 29, 2023, 08:46:27 AMQuote from: Angry_Kitty on May 26, 2023, 11:54:41 AMIf everybody will use only the trusted platforms it will be impossible for new platforms to develop because nobody will use them.Are you willing to entrust your money to individuals you do not know? or trade in an untrustworthy location?Traders require assurance of trade security at your platform. How can we trust you if you don't ensure trade security at your platform?They changed their smart contract and do not pay. It is better not to trust the people that you do not know not to be desipointed and not to lose money.

comments.author: cryptoserega
comments.body: Quote from: Defi_space on August 08, 2023, 07:12:20 AMThey changed their smart contract and do not pay. It is better not to trust the people that you do not know not to be desipointed and not to lose money.There are so many scams and many people lost so much money. Many projects can not realize all their ideas. That is why it is very important to realize the potential of every project before investing not to lose money in it.

comments.author: Binity
comments.body: Quote from: cryptoserega on August 08, 2023, 12:54:39 PMQuote from: Defi_space on August 08, 2023, 07:12:20 AMThey changed their smart contract and do not pay. It is better not to trust the people that you do not know not to be desipointed and not to lose money.There are so many scams and many people lost so much money. Many projects can not realize all their ideas. That is why it is very important to realize the potential of every project before investing not to lose money in it.It was a lot of many advertizement here, but a lot of advertizement does not mean that the project will not be a scam in the future.

comments.author: Corsac
comments.body: One more scam. It is not good for the industry in the whole. So many scams.

comments.author: Garsipop
comments.body: Quote from: romanfrolovv on August 10, 2023, 07:18:07 AMQuote from: Corsac on August 09, 2023, 10:24:36 AMOne more scam. It is not good for the industry in the whole. So many scams.I agree that there are so many scams and so many people lose their money that it is very important to be so careful and everything check many times befor investing.Hope when cryptocurrency will be more regulated it will be less scams. Scammers must know that they will have panishment befor the law for their scams.

comments.author: Corsac
comments.body: Quote from: Garsipop on August 10, 2023, 09:31:34 AMHope when cryptocurrency will be more regulated it will be less scams. Scammers must know that they will have panishment befor the law for their scams.I saw a lot of advertisement and promotion here. Many people invested money here. It is shows one more time how it is important to check everything befor investing not to lose money on investment.

comments.body: Quote from: Corsac on August 11, 2023, 07:53:15 AMQuote from: Garsipop on August 10, 2023, 09:31:34 AMHope when cryptocurrency will be more regulated it will be less scams. Scammers must know that they will have panishment befor the law for their scams.I saw a lot of advertisement and promotion here. Many people invested money here. It is shows one more time how it is important to check everything befor investing not to lose money on investment.To many scams but now is the fall of the market and it is really very difficult for all the projects to realize all their ideas. That is why there are so many scams.

comments.author: Angry_Kitty
comments.body: Quote from: cryptoserega on August 11, 2023, 11:59:10 AMTo many scams but now is the fall of the market and it is really very difficult for all the projects to realize all their ideas. That is why there are so many scams.Sometimes it is very difficult to say is it a real scam or simple the team was not able to realized all planned ideas because it was unexperienced. That is why it is very important to check the team and its experience.

comments.author: Buakaw_Club
comments.body: Quote from: Angry_Kitty on August 12, 2023, 07:43:58 AMQuote from: cryptoserega on August 11, 2023, 11:59:10 AMTo many scams but now is the fall of the market and it is really very difficult for all the projects to realize all their ideas. That is why it is very important to check the team and its experience.It is hard to say why project has become scam and why it became a scam but in all the cases people lost their money.

comments.author: Cryptozaika
comments.body: Quote from: Buakaw_Club on August 12, 2023, 05:46:06 PMIt is hard to say why project has become scam and why it became a scam but in all the cases people lost their money.There are so many different scams. And it is not good for the cryptocurrency industry, people stop to trust it and stop to trust cryptocurrency at all.

comments.body: Quote from: Cryptozaika on August 13, 2023, 08:19:33 AMQuote from: Buakaw_Club on August 12, 2023, 05:46:06 PMIt is hard to say why project has become scam and why it became a scam but in all the cases people lost their money.There are so many different scams. And it is not good for the cryptocurrency industry, people stop to trust it and stop to trust cryptocurrency at all.This project shows one more time that every project can become a scam and it is very important to check everything because there is no trust in the cryptocurrency.

comments.author: Binity
comments.body: Quote from: Earn_Finance on August 13, 2023, 01:40:15 PMQuote from: Cryptozaika on August 13, 2023, 08:19:33 AMQuote from: Buakaw_Club on August 12, 2023, 05:46:06 PMIt is hard to say why project has become scam and why it became a scam but in all the cases people lost their money.There are so many different scams. And it is not good for the cryptocurrency industry, people stop to trust it and stop to trust cryptocurrency at all.This project shows one more time that every project can become a scam and it is very important to check everything because there is no trust in the cryptocurrency.People continue to lose money and scams continue to appear. There are so many scams and it is necessary to remember about it and to forget it.
